inventory=[{"type": "stripped_dark_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 26}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 28, "index": 30}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 64, "index": 39}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a stone_hoe, I need to craft a stick and dark_oak_planks. I can craft dark_oak_planks from stripped_dark_oak_wood, so I will move the stripped_dark_oak_wood from slot 18 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1
